features: ❀【High Temperature Steam Cleaner】: This pressurized steam cleaner has powerful 2500 watts, it can generate 230°F high temperature steam, which can easily remove stubborn oil stains and stains. The high temperature steam cleaner is easy to operate and deep clean, it can well meet your different daily cleaning needs.

❀【Large Capacity Water Tank】: Our steam cleaners is equipped with a large water tank with a capacity of 1500mm, which is convenient and practical, it can not only prolong the cleaning time, but also reduce the number of times of adding water. 10-second quick heat-up function, spray powerful high-pressure steam without waiting.

❀【Chemical-Free Steam Cleaning】: This steam carpet cleaner is 100% chemical-free, physically cleans, it has no harmful fumes or residues, we can use it with confidence. Portable steam cleaner is specially designed for cleaning without dead ends, just hold the handle and push the button forward to release the steam directly.

❀【Multipurpose Steam Cleaner】: Handheld steam cleaners comes with a power cord and connectable extension hose, flexible and durable, it can provide greater reach for those hard-to-reach places. This high pressure steam cleaner can be used in many areas, it is suitable for kitchen, bathroom, floor, carpet, car and air conditioner.

❀【Practical Accessories】: This steam cleaner for home has several practical accessories: brass brush, nozzle, extension hose, nylon brush and heat-resistant gloves, it allows us to deal with corners, crevices and other small spaces with ease. The steam cleaning machine saves you time and energy, it makes cleaning a breeze.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Flgocexs high pressure steam cleaner is efficient and practical, it provides deep cleaning without the use of harsh chemicals. 6-level adjustable function: It is specially designed for cleaning without dead corners, and we can easily adjust it as needed. Power cord and attachable extension hose: It provides greater reach for those hard-to-reach places. Save you time and energy, it makes cleaning your home a breeze!

Portable Handle Flgocexs steam cleaning machine has a portable handle design, so it can be easily carried from one place to another. To avoid burns, wear gloves and make sure the waterproof gasket is installed correctly. High Temperature Steam Cleaner Handheld steam cleaner, 2500 watts of powerful power, it can produce 230°F high temperature steam, strong and powerful, deep cleaning, it can well meet your different daily cleaning needs. Large Capacity Water Tank Our steam carpet cleaner is equipped with a large water tank with a capacity of 1500 milliliters(Maxi Load: 1750ml), which can reduce the number of water refills. The wide top opening makes refilling and cleaning easy.

Portable steam cleaner has a 10-second fast heating function, no need to wait, it can spray powerful high-pressure steam. Steam temperatures can be as high as 230°F. It can easily clean all kinds of stubborn oil stains and dirt. It is widely used in kitchens, bathrooms, furniture, cars, carpets and floors.

The high temperature steam cleaner is lightweight and easy to operate, it comes with 3 different brass brush heads and 1 pair of insulated gloves. It allows us to easily tackle hard-to-reach areas such as corners, crannies, and tight spaces. It is suitable for cleaning walls, stoves, oil fumes, microwave ovens, washing machines and refrigerators.

This steam cleaner for home is 100% chemical-free and physically cleans, it has no harmful fumes or residue. The built-in safety child hat can keep your family and children from harm. Just hold the handle and push the steam button forward to release steam directly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, good value
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how quickly this starts after you turn it on. I like how it comes with multiple scrub accessories, how the hose is long, and the handle. Worked well for me! Just note of caution- don’t use it on/near painted walls - I had some paint peel off near caulk when I did this. Best on non-pourous surfaces - bathrooms, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Too many pieces to put together and looks very cheap. Took it out of the box and immediately put it back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Honestly I thought by it being so small it wouldn’t do the job. BUT BOY WAS I Wrong. 10 out of 10 I recommend. It’s very lightweight. It gets really hot (which I like). It’s perfect for the bathroom tile, floors and whole house baseboards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The off on switch is unreliable. Hard to turn off and turns on by it seldom at times, safety problum. There is no off/on switch to choke off steam at handle, safety issue. Other then that unit works very good but I am returning if becouse I won't let my wife use it by here self.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use and cleans super well. I have now used it on bathroom and floors. Dirt came right off and in tight corners dirt slid off. Easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overnight delivery is the BOMB
reviews.reviewText: I am not knocked out by the product. Let's just say that the video is "overly enthusiastic." So it doesn't work nearly as well as I'd hoped. However, HAT'S OFF TO AMAZON OVERNIGHT DELIVERY :D I got the package by 7:15 AM!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this machine
reviews.reviewText: Best cleaning machine ever very powerful highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and effective to use
reviews.reviewText: I tried this steam cleaner on my dirty car seats and it did a great job at loosening old stains and dirt. I was so pleasantly surprised how effective it is. The machine is lightweight so not bulky to carry.
